title: Norway Rallies Behind Royals, Despite Dismay Over Epstein Links
summary_full: The future queen’s links to Jeffrey Epstein, and her son’s rape trial, have disappointed many Norwegians. But there is still widespread support for the monarchy.
summary_public: The future queen’s links to Jeffrey Epstein, and her son’s rape trial, have disappointed many Norwegians. But there is still widespread support for the monarchy.

NO.label: neutral
NO.evidence: Norway Rallies Behind Royals, Despite Dismay Over Epstein Links
